title: No Ranked Rewards
body: I got ranked in Gold this season, but everyone has already gotten their rewards and borders, ect. But I still haven't gotten anything. If anything is to restrict me from getting these rewards, can someone please tell me? I'm confused and I was really looking forward to the rewards.

replies.body:
We're still rolling out ranked rewards, so sit tight until we've had a chance to get those out to everyone. We're not meaning to leave anyone behind. ^.^

Let me know if you have any questions.
Only one question, if you get the 14 day ban in the middle of the season, does that restrict me of getting the ranked rewards at all?

Depends on the season. Each season has slightly different dates or criteria that can disqualify you for ranked rewards. You can find the ones for Season 6 (2016) [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/230496748).

I hope that helps!
It's not letting me open the page, it's saying I'm not authorized. :(

Can you try a different browser or try [clearing your browser's cache](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies)?

Let me know if this helped.
It didn't, but I did find an alternate source. Which sucks cause I found out there's a decent chance I'm not getting my rewards cause of my friend. Thank you!
don't worry man im in plat and still haven't gotten my stuff either
